content: embrace the winter chill with our crunch stitch ear warmer and cowl pattern set designed to add a touch of texture and warmth to your ensemble pairing an ear warmer and cowl featuring the distinctive crunch stitch it offers a satisfying project with a stylish twist utilizing the versatile paintbox simply aran a #4 weight yarn each skein brings forth 184 meters of vibrant color and softness with inclusivity in mind the patterns span various sizes from age 2 to adult ensuring the perfect fit for kids teens and adults ❤ layout my patterns all share the same layout which is easy to read and easy to find important information you need such as materials needed sizing information gauge information and special stitches used as well as how to do them these stitches often come with an accompanying video for further clarification ❤ size this cozy ear warmer pattern is written for 5 sizes - child teen adult small medium and large ❤ materials any 4 weight yarn of your choosing - i used paintbox simply aran for my version 5mm hook scissors tapestry needle stitch markers optional to mark first or last stitch of the round measuring tape
